name: New Hope Counseling and Recovery
description: CARF-accredited outpatient mental health and substance abuse treatment center providing comprehensive behavioral health services. Offers individual, group, and family counseling for children, adolescents, and adults. Services include anger management, PTSD, grief, anxiety, depression, substance abuse treatment, and medication-assisted treatment (MAT). KY DOC approved for court-ordered treatment.
source: Verified from official website and Google search results
eligibility_requirements: Serves children ages 5 and up, adolescents, and adults. Accepts court-ordered clients and those seeking voluntary treatment. Services available to residents of Laurel and surrounding counties.
populations_served: Children (ages 5+), adolescents, adults, families, court-ordered clients, individuals with mental health conditions, substance abuse disorders
cost_information: Accepts insurance and offers sliding scale fees. Contact for specific payment information.
